SubChapter.title: Get the tools
SubChapter.Body:
To start development with BCD-UI first get the tools
Make sure you have at jdk 1.6 update 6 or higher.
Install the appropriate Eclipse WTP version, best with BCD plugins
Install Tomcat 6.13 or higher
Add Tomcat as a server to Eclipse (Run->Run configurations...->Apache)
Make sure you have IE>=6 or FireFox, Chrome and Safari are also supported
It is possible to develop BCD-UI with other IDE as Eclipse as well, but BCD-UI development plugins are only available for Eclipse. Also any other J2EE application server like Weblogic, Websphere or Oracle AS can be used.
